content:
From: Gergely Buday <buday.gergely@uni-eszterhazy.hu>
Hi,

I am to use the 2005 version of Isabelle for discovering old proofs.

I could not find documentation for it, neither on the Internet, nor in the
release, it seems that it was not part of tha package then.

I am interested in running the proofs step by step, both on the command
line, and, if possible, with Proof General.

Where can I find relevant documentation?

  • Gergely

From: "C. Diekmann" <diekmann@in.tum.de>
Dear Gergely,

downloading the tar.gz for Isabelle2005 (October 2005) from

http://isabelle.in.tum.de/download_past.html

I found for example ref.dvi and tutorial.dvi in the doc folder. It looks
like tutorial.dvi covers some Proof General.

Hope this helps,
Cornelius
